sequence:
Journé Surcouf!

<size=45>Chapter 7 - Surcouf in My Arms</size>

options.content: Smile and tell her the time

scripts.say: Oh geez, it's that late already?!
I'm so sorry, Commander! I tried to wake you up when breaktime was over, but you were sleeping so soundly, and I just...
I didn't MEAN to fall asleep and leave you hanging! P-please, don't be angry... okay?
Surcouf was visibly flustered. You rarely see her like this.
Is that all... your work for today?
Wow, it's all done! You're the most amazing person ever, Commander!

options.content: I couldn't have done it without you

scripts.say: But I wasn't of any help... You did it all on your own... I'm a failure of a secretary...
Y-you mean it...? But all I did was sleep and chat with you...
Is it possible I'm... helping you just by sleeping in your office...?
... Ah well, better not think too hard♪ If you say I was useful, then I was!
Whew, that sure was a day of hard secretary work! Good job, me!
I'll put in just as much effort tomorrow!
Just a moment ago, Surcouf seemed depressed, but now she appeared pleased with herself.
Oh, right! Remember how we talked about going to Dunkerque's place for some tasty sweets?
I say first we get some dinner, then we head straight to Dunkerque's place for dessert~!
... Y'know, I enjoy every day spent with you, Commander♪
And I enjoy every day spent with you, Surcouf.
